1.text: Mix papaya, cacao powder, and aloe vera to create glowing skin.

2.text: Reduce acne with a turmeric, aloe gel, and honey mask.
2.vid: /b/bf/Make an Aloe Vera Face Mask Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Soothe your skin by making a mask with matcha, aloe gel, and bentonite clay.
3.vid: /8/85/Make an Aloe Vera Face Mask Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Make your skin look vibrant with coffee, sugar, and aloe gel.
4.vid: /0/05/Make an Aloe Vera Face Mask Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Wash your skin with cleanser and exfoliant.

6.text: Take a shower to open up your pores.

7.text: Brush the mixture over your skin.
7.vid: /e/e3/Make an Aloe Vera Face Mask Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Leave the mask on your face for 10 minutes.

9.text: Rinse off your face with cold water.
